title: ðŸš¨ Blockbuster Trade: Russell Wilson dealt to Broncos after 10 seasons with Seahawks - Emergency Podcast (Football 3/8)
description:
Join the Pick Six March Madness Bracket Challenge for your chance to win a $100 Paramount Plus Gift Card! Enter here:Â cbssports.com/PickSixBrackets

It's the week before free agency even begins and we're having a wild Tuesday in the NFL. First, Aaron Rodgers returned to the Packers and now we have a MASSIVE departure. After 10 seasons and a Super Bowl in Seattle, Russell Wilson is being traded by the Seahawks to the Denver Broncos for a huge package in return. On this episode, Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech to break down the move from every angle. They discuss the compensation, Russ' impact on the Broncos' Super Bowl odds, the future in Seattle and much more. Join us for this emergency episode!

'Pick Six' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox and wherever else you listen to podcasts.Â 
You can listen to Pick Six on your smart speakers! Simply say "Alexa, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast" or "Hey Google, play the latest episode of the Pick Six NFL podcast."
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @ryanwilsonCBS, @johnbreech, @E_DeBerardinis
